title: Coconut Delight Fudge Creme Oreo Cookie Review: Oreo Oration
description:
Thought Nabisco's madness ended with the Peanut Butter Fudge Creme Oreo Cookie? Oreo Oration shows you that was just the beginning. This is the Coconut Delight Fudge Creme Oreo Cookie review!

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody welcome to an Oreo oration I'm Greg Miller and while you were out living your life roof in your house or whatever the hell it is you do the fine people at Oreo we're making endless variations to milk's favorite cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like this video and then subscribe to my channel today we're reviewing coconut Delight Oreo fudge creme yes ladies and gentlemen Prem's week continues we just had peanut butter the other day as I'm sure you all know Oreo Asian begins the same way each week we do the first off the tear open here the first look we call it Nabisco give it up oh look it out they're not all over the place they are not tossing around like school children that are unloved oh man and as a coconut fan let me tell you yeah this is a treat for my nostril ah let's jump right in then the next test is taste yep yep know what you want again similar to peanut butter

Unloved, oh man, and as a coconut fan, let me tell you, yeah, this is a treat for my nostrils. Ah, let's jump right in then. The next test is taste. Yep, yep, know what you want again. Similar to peanut butter, you're getting the coconut dumped on top there, then you get the thin cookie. The cookie itself I don't really taste ever. You taste the fudge, you taste the coconut; you're going back and forth between this chocolatey coconut sensation. I do think the coconut is a much more pronounced flavor if you will than the peanut butter was. It tends to speak more loudly than the peanut butter did. There's definitely an alternate alteration – their alternation, I should say – between the chocolate and the coconut. I like that a lot. Um, moving right down how audio aeration works next. We pair it with milk again. We've learned the hard way these fudge creams are impervious to milk; it's like bullets bouncing off Superman's chest. But we'll try anyway – try to soften up again – three dunks, Hold'em, third one to three; see what we

the hard way these fudge creams impervious to milk it's like bullets bouncing off Superman's chest but we'll try anyway try to soften up again three dunks Hold'em third one to three see what we get out of this guy mmm-hmm nothing it's like punching a vault wall delicious however we did learn the sad truth last time right on Wednesday you get the fudge teeth gotta be careful the fudge teeth I hope you at home when you're eating with your family you make them eat them as well you don't have to you actually use the paper towel toothbrush there's a patent to Greg Miller move though twisting again impossible to twist but that's just how the cookies made that's how the cookie crumbles you can't get mad at Nabisco about that you can't get mad at the Oreo people about that so now we're down to reviewing what do you want to give coconut Delight Oreos Greg Miller games the peanut butter 109 I got it I'm gonna stick with a nine I think if I wasn't using a 20-point scale I could go up a little

reviewing what do you want to give coconut Delight Oreos Greg Miller games the peanut butter 109 I got it I'm gonna stick with a nine I think if I wasn't using a 20-point scale I could go up a little higher on the nine scale but it's not a nine five it's not a berry blast but it's definitely a tasty Oreo problems of course being fudge teeth you know our mothers warned about them they're here now in the new millennium and then can't twist them can't dunk them there they're definitely a good snacky Oreo when you're on the go or you have people over and say hey even Nabisco's going out of their freakin mind let's try a crazy cookie so that's the way the cookie crumbles for coconut Delight Oreo fudge creams but what do you think leave your review as a video response then like the video share it with your friends all that jazz but here's the most important thing viewer what Oreos are I missing there's got to be Oreos out there that I haven't reviewed leave them in the comments below so I

It with your friends, all that jazz. But here's the most important thing: viewer, what Oreos are missing? There's got to be Oreos out there that I haven't reviewed - leave them in the comments below so I know where to go. Then share the video with your friends; make sure people watch these otherwise I wasted a whole bunch of money and time buying Oreos for no reason other than they're delicious cookies, Nabisco's their day. I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of these cookies to review - but until then, keep on dunking.
